WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

this chart shows the same (first) value for all 3 series. It seems to bind to the ValueMember of the first element in the series for all 3 series.

          <charts:ClusteredColumnChart Style="{StaticResource MinimalChartStyle}" ChartTitle="Overview">
            <charts:ClusteredColumnChart.Series>
              <charts:ChartSeries SeriesTitle="Takeoffs" ValueMember="TotalTakeoffs" DisplayMember="AircraftDisplayName" ItemsSource="{Binding Statistics}" />
              <charts:ChartSeries SeriesTitle="Flight-Time" ValueMember="TotalFlightTimeMinutes" DisplayMember="AircraftDisplayName" ItemsSource="{Binding Statistics}" />
              <charts:ChartSeries SeriesTitle="Engine-Runtime" ValueMember="TotalEngineRuntimeMinutes" DisplayMember="AircraftDisplayName" ItemsSource="{Binding Statistics}" />
            </charts:ClusteredColumnChart.Series>
          </charts:ClusteredColumnChart>
WorkItem.Summary: Multiple Series in ClusteredColumnChart all show value of first series
